text: The Battle of Stalingrad () is a 1949 Soviet war movie directed by Vladimir Petrov.Сталинградская битваСталинградская битва (1949) It stars Aleksei Dikiy, Maksim Shtraukh, and Viktor Khokhryakov. ==Actors== *Aleksei Dikiy – Joseph Stalin *Maksim Shtraukh – Vyacheslav Molotov *Viktor Khokhryakov – Georgy Malenkov *Mikhail Kvarelashvili – Lavrentiy Beria *Nikolai Dorokhin – Nikita Khrushchev *Vladimir Solovyov – Mikhail Kalinin *Yuri Tolubeyev – Andrei Zhdanov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1949 war movies Category:1940s epic movies Category:1940s biographical movies Category:1940s action movies Category:World War II movies Category:Russian war movies Category:Russian biographical movies Category:Russian action movies Category:Movies directed by Vladimir Petrov Category:Movies released in separate parts
title: The Battle of Stalingrad (movie)
